com.dmide.ui.tabs

Interface TabbedPaneUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DMFileEditorPane, FileEditorPane, TextFileEditorPane

    public interface TabbedPaneUI
    Cool things happen with TabbedPanes, figure it out.
    Author:
    Adolph C.

        Returns:
        the title of the tab.

      • getTabIcon

        javax.swing.Icon getTabIcon()
        Returns:
        the icon displayed to the left of the title.

      • displayTabCloseButton

        boolean displayTabCloseButton()
        Returns:
        true if the close button should be visible.

      • getIdentifier

        java.lang.Object getIdentifier()
        Returns:
        a unique identifier with a .equals method to find this tab.

      • canCloseTab

        boolean canCloseTab()
        Returns:
        true if this tab can be closed, false otherwise.

        Called when the tab is closed successfully.
